subject: Records and Achievements
Track and Field
Olympic Games
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Budd, a senior at Villanova University, set the record for the 100-yard dash at 9.2 seconds in 1961, a year after competing at the Rome Olympics.
snippet: Mr. Budd, a senior at Villanova University, set the record for the 100-yard dash at 9.2 seconds in 1961, a year after competing at the Rome Olympics.
